content: pink lemonade by amy rapp materials about 200 yd of sock yarn designer used malabrigo sock in light of love needles size 1 5 us or size to get gauge double pointed needles or circular needles will work with this pattern tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 8 stitches and 12 row per inch stitch glossary k knit p purl yo yarn over sl slip purlwise k2tog knit two stitches together p2tog purl two stitches together ssk slip two stitches knitwise one at a time return them to left needle knit together through back loop sk2p slip one stitch purlwise knit next two stitches together pass slipped stitch over cast on 64 stitches join to knit in the round cuff round 1 k2 p2 repeat around repeat this round a total of 6 times knit one round heel flap the heel flap is worked across the next 32 stitches row 1 sl1 k1 across row 2 sl1 p 31 repeat these two row a total of at least 16 times copyright amy rapp 2021 heel turn row 1 sl1 k16 ssk k1 row 2 sl p3 p2tog p1 row 3 sl1 k to last stitch before gap ssk k1 row 4 sl1 p to last stitch before gap p2tog p1 repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have been worked 18 heel stitches remain gusset round 1 sl1 k across heel pick up one stitch for each repeat worked on the heel flap plus one in the corner to avoid a gap 17 picked up stitches for a 32-row heel knit first row of instep pattern pick up 1 stitch in the corner then one stitch for each repeat worked on the heel flap work 9 heel stitches this is the new beginning of the round round 2 knit to last three sole stitches k2tog k1 knit across instep in pattern k1 ssk k to end of round round 3 knit to instep knit across instep in pattern knit to end of round repeat rounds 2 and 3 until you have 32 sole stitches knit to end of sole at this point the beginning of the instep will become the beginning of the round foot continue to knit the instep pattern on the instep and k across the sole end with an odd numbered round instep sock 1 round 1 and all odd numbered rounds p1 k7 p1 k23 round 2 p1 k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 p1 k23 round 4 p1 k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 p1 k23 round 6 p1 k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 p1 k23 round 8 p1 k2 yo sk2p yo k2 p1 k23 round 10 p1 k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k1 p1 k23 round 12 p1 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk p1 k23 copyright amy rapp 2021 instep sock 2 round 1 and all odd numbered rounds k23 p1 k7 p1 round 2 k23 p1 k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 p1 round
